* Zyber sighed and followed Rowdy back to his cave, leaving the star-talk behind. It was strange to her, a bot like him who had not had much contact with others seemed not to really be one who liked to talk. But then again, perhaps she was talking too much.
Zyber sighed again, everyone was different.*
